response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your endeavors or personal collection. After careful consideration, I propose to offer this exceptional product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This is a generous offer that allows you to secure such a valuable asset at a fraction of its true market value. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you every step of the way.", "product_price": 1200000}
